item.title: Intercomparison of aircraft and ground based measurements of pollutants and aerosols near major pollution sources over Taiwan [Poster]
Intercomparison of aircraft and ground based measurements near major pollution sources over Taiwan (Ongoing)
item.description:
In this project, we focus on the pollutions near major sources over western Taiwan. Aircraft-based observation data are analyzed and compared with surface measurements to investigate near surface chemical reactions of pollutants. The preliminary result was presented in 18th ACC in Taipei in Dec. 2019.


Data used in this project:

  • Aircraft-baed observation
  • Ground-based measurements
  • Sounding and Lidar data
  • Reanalysis data

item.title: Tracer distribution simulation in western Taiwan using high resolution Taiwan Vector Vorticity Model (Ongoing)
item.description:
In this project, I analyzed simulation results and evaluated the impact on target regions, which usually have terrible air pollutions. In the next stage, we aim to applied zero and first-order chemical reactions into the model to inspect lifetime effect on the regions so as to understand the sources of the pollutant in those highly-polluted regions.


Data used in this project:

  • Taiwan Vector Vorticity Modeling results
  • Ground-based measurements
